TranDtls.comment_TaxSch: Tax scheme, always 'GST' for Indian e-invoices
TranDtls.comment_SupTyp: Type of supply — B2B, B2C, SEZ, EXP, etc.
TranDtls.comment_RegRev: Reverse charge applicable? 'Y' for Yes, 'N' for No
TranDtls.comment_IgstOnIntra: If 'Y', IGST applies even for intra-state supply

DocDtls.comment_Typ: Document type — INV for Invoice, CRN for Credit Note, DRN for Debit Note etc.
DocDtls.comment_No: Unique invoice number issued by the supplier
DocDtls.comment_Dt: Date of invoice in DD/MM/YYYY format

SellerDtls.comment_TrdNm: Seller’s trade name, if different from legal name
SellerDtls.comment_Loc: City or locality of seller’s address
SellerDtls.comment_Stcd: State code as per GST (e.g. 29 = Karnataka)

BuyerDtls.comment_Gstin: Buyer’s GSTIN (must match registered state code)first two letters(29)
BuyerDtls.comment_Pos: Place of Supply (state code) — same as buyer’s state for intra-state

ItemList.comment_SlNo: Item serial number in the invoice
ItemList.comment_IsServc: Y for Service, N for Goods
ItemList.comment_TaxAmts: SGST/CGST/IGST split depending on intra/inter state
ItemList.comment_CesAmt: cess Amount :monetary value of the cess calculated on the taxable value of the item
ItemList.comment_CesNonAdvlAmt: Non-Advol Cess Amount-Some cesses cannot be claimed as input tax credit. These are “non-advalorem” or non-adval cesses.
ItemList.comment_Ces: Cess components, if any (usually 0 for normal goods)
ItemList.comment_TotItemVal: Total value of item including taxes and other charges

ValDtls.comment_AssVal: Total taxable value of all items
ValDtls.comment_CesVal: Final invoice amount including all taxes
ValDtls.comment_TotInvVal: Final invoice amount including all taxes
